stepDescription.title: Description
examples: This is an image map step

key.title: Key
key.description: The key used to store the selected value from this step

nextStep.title: Next step
nextStep.description: The next step the widget will go to after the user finishes with the current step

canSkip.title: Can skip step
canSkip.description: Option to set this step as being skippable or not. If you set this to true, you need to have the nextStep property defined in the step and not in the tile

label.title: Step value label
label.description: The label used to show the value selected in the step. This will be used in the summary screen

message.title: Tile hover message
message.description: The message to be displayed when hovering over an area of the image map. The message can contain dinamic keys that are specified in the "areas" object inside "mappings" object. The keys should be enclosed in brackets. The keys will be replaced with the corresponding value when displayed to the user.

mappings.title: Image map mappings
mappings.description: Here you specify the mappings for the image map

img.title: Image to be mapped
img.description: An url of the image based on which to create the image map

width.title: Image map width
width.description: The width of the image map

imgWidth.title: Image width
imgWidth.description: The width of the image used to create the image map. This is used in order to properly calculate the areas if the image map width is different than the image width

strokeColor.title: Area hover stroke color
strokeColor.description: The color of the stroke applied to an area on hover

areas.title: Image map areas definitions
areas.description: Here we define the image map areas

items.title: Area definition
items.description: Definition of different parameters needed to render the area. You can have additional parameters defined here which can be used in the "message" property enclosed in brackets

_id.title: The id of the area
_id.description: This should be a unique integer number

name.title: The name of the area
name.description: The name of this specific area

shape.title: The shape of the area
shape.description: The shape of the area to render

coords.title: Coordinates definitions
coords.description: Definitions of the coordinates used to render the area

value.title: The value of the area
value.description: The value to be passed on when this area is selected

preFillColor.title: Color of the area
preFillColor.description: The color of the area when it is rendered

fillColor.title: Color of the area when hovered
fillColor.description: The color of the area when it is hovered
